thread.title: A Walk to Remember: Where Are They Now?
thread.title_full: A Walk to Remember: Where Are They Now?

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: A Walk to Remember: Where Are They Now?
text:
Where Is the Cast of a Walk to Remember Now? A Walk to Remember: Where Are They Now? January 25, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 A Walk to Remember: Where Are They Now? 
It's hard to believe that A Walk to Remember turns 15-years-old this year! It seems like just yesterday Mandy Moore and Shane West were making us bawl our eyes out over their star-crossed love story. As what is arguably one of Nicholas Sparks 's best movie adaptions, fans still go crazy over the heartbreaking romantic drama . This week's anniversary has us wondering what the cast is up to now.
